name: Womens Headband -WOMENS SIZE - Green Damask with Newsprint Reversible Fabric Headband
description:
Totally reversible. You will get two great looks in one headband. You can't go wrong with these. Wear one to work, for working out, while you are vacationing at the beach. These stylish headbands keep those fly-a-ways out of your eyes.

FEATURES
--------------------
*Constructed using high quality designer fabric.
*Interlining is used to give the headband a structured look that helps keep its shape, while still being soft and flexible.
*A coordinating elastic band is used to provide a comfortable, but snug fit on your head.
*Machine washable, warm iron if need be.
*Will be wrapped and present ready. Perfect for a gift to a friend or for yourself!

DIMENSIONS
----------------------
Headband is 2" at top, tapering down to 1" toward the ear & base of neck.

Headband measures 21" around. Will stretch to 23".
